Dm_ZO_0044_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0d01><snd:SurpriseL_01>That monster is covered in sludge!


<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:ShidoClench_01>Could it be the foul beast that
harmed Father?
Dm_ZO_0044_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:SurpriseS_00>What has happened, my friend? Did you
figure something out?
Dm_ZO_0044_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0601>...


<sp:3:0:2:0601><snd:TalkPositive_02>You are right, as ever. It is up to
you, milady!
Dm_ZO_0044_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>You solved the ancient stone slate's
riddle, and a pillar of light appeared?!

<sp:3:0:2:0001>If the words upon the stone slate are
correct, a path to the sky may open up if
we investigate that location...
Dm_ZO_0044_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0601><snd:ShidoClench_01>Link! Please, I must ask that you fight at
my side once more!
Dm_ZO_0044_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:ShidoClench_01>Lady Yona! It is far too dangerous for you
to be here!
Dm_ZO_0044_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Darling, I came here because there is
something I need to speak with you about.
I have been thinking for quite some time...
Dm_ZO_0044_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0601><snd:Care_02>My dear Sidon.


I think that you should go with Link to
investigate that pillar of light. As I was
just about to say...
For a long time, I have been concerned
that you are holding yourself back and not
acting as freely as I would have expected.
But, my love, if you and Link join your
powers, I am certain you shall be able to
overcome whatever danger awaits.
Dm_ZO_0044_30:
We can take care of the water, at least
for a little while. Do not fret about
the domain.
Dm_ZO_0044_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Care_01>Whatever is troubling you, Sidon?
Why are you hesitating so?
Dm_ZO_0044_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Well done, Link!<sp:5:1:0> This is a
huge development!
